عن
حول لشبكة إي آند مصر

نظام HI Traveler

الذي يتيح لك الاستمتاع بباقات متنوعه لتلبي احتياجك من الانترنت و المكالمات الدوليه و المحليه بافضل الاسعار

اعرف المزيد 
اكتشف
خدماتنا
إي آند كاش
بإمكانك تحويل النقود في الحال عن طريق الموبايل لأي رقم في مصر ولأى محفظة في مصر, من خلال إي آند كاش سدد فاتورتك او اشحن رصيد ليك و لغيرك و الشراء عبر الانترنت عن طريق بطاقة كاش (VCN) الائتمانية بدون قلق من سرقة بيانات كارتك الائتماني
اعرف المزيد
الدليل الشخصي

الان عن طريق الاتصال ب 7070 يمكنك ان تعرف ارقام و عناوين اي مكان في مصر و ايضا حجز تذاكر السينما

Emerald GTO exclusive discounts

New and existing Emerald customers can enjoy a guaranteed discount up to 30% on the lowest hotel prices found online worldwide!


Know More 
Family

With Emerald you can have up to 7 lines in One account, You can always add your family and friends with NO extra charges.
Have one bill of hassle and have full control over it and set a credit limit per family line.

Manage your bundle at your convenience by distributing and transferring the quota among your members though My e& egypt application or Through *800#

Know More 
Emerald Exclusive Privileges

VIP Lounges: Enjoy instant complimentary access up to 840 global airport lounges exclusive to Emerald members with your ADIB- e& egypt card.

Personal Account Manager: Enjoy having a personal account manager round the clock to accommodate to any of your requests just to make your life easier wherever your are in the world!

Know More 
E-coins Entertainment Experience

Whether it’s Movies, TV Shows, Music or Sports, now with Emerald’s e-coins you get to choose and customize your own entertainment bundle from a massive library of services.

Have full flexibility over your MI quota by carrying-over unused mobile internet to the next month.
Or you can borrow up to 50% from the following month's quota to enjoy mobile internet.

Upon each Akwa kart or Mobile internet bundles subscription or renewing your Hekaya or Demagh Tanya bundles, you will collect coins that you can redeem for many gifts such as Twist, Tod, or Viu subscriptions, as well as cash back, vouchers from E-Shop & World of deals and many other gifts.

Visit My e& app or call *1111# to join Coins program!

My e& egypt app
Coins Program
Features

1 ⚊Coins Program is available to all Ahlan, Hekaya, and Demagh Tanya Customers.

2 ⚊ Now all customer with Hekaya and Demagh Tanya non renewed bundles will be able to collect and redeem coins

3 ⚊ Coins program offers a variant gift catalogue

Program
Details
1
Join The Program

Accumulate coins now! You can now join Coins program through My e& or through *1111#.

2
Coins Accumulation

For every 1 EGP spent on Akwa kart recharge you will collect 1 coin and for every EGP spent on monthly bundle renewal you will collect 2 coins.

3
Gift Redemption

Log-in on to My e& to redeem your coins with a huge variety of gifts .

Discover ⚊
‘Our Gifts’

Check Our Partners:

Terms &
Condition
1

You can’t collect coins upon recharging balance, you have to subscribe to Akwa Kart bundles or renew any monthly bundle .

2

If you chose cashback gift while not having an active wallet, coins will be deducted, and all you need to do is visit the nearest e& branch and activate the wallet, then dial *1111# and choose the wallet cash gift. You will find the cashback saved in your new wallet. .

3

If the customer didn’t activate the wallet after a week of exchanging the gift (choosing the cash gift), the coins will be returned back to the customer.

Choose Among The Payment And Recharge Options Below For Your Convenience.

Payment
Methods
Online Payment

Log In To My Account And Pay Your Bill Securely Using Your Visa Or MasterCard

Stores

Banks

e& WI-FI Calling

Wi-Fi calling is the latest technology from e& to continue offering the best experience for customers who can now use Wi-Fi network to make and receive voice calls.

Please read the terms and conditions :

1 ⚊The quality of Wi-Fi Calling services can be affected by the quality of the Wi-Fi signal as well as the speed of the Internet connection.

2 ⚊No Wi-Fi calling when internet service is disrupted or power is cut off.

3 ⚊Voice call can be affected/interrupted when out of Wi-Fi coverage to 2G or 3G mobile network.

4 ⚊The Wi-Fi call is charged based on your current bundle charging

5 ⚊This feature is for ADSL / VDSL home routers only, and not available through Home 4G.

6 ⚊Relief and emergency calls can be affected when using Wi-fi Calling.

7 ⚊List of eligible handsets.

8 ⚊ Activation steps for each brand .

9 ⚊The service can be activated using the USSD code *2175#

10 ⚊The service will not be provided when the customer activates flight mode or international roaming.

11 ⚊The service will be suspended in accordance with any regulatory decisions issued by the National Telecommunications Regulatory Authority.

Terms and conditions apply.

NOTE:

• Wi-Fi calling service will be gradually available for e& customers.

Steps on how to activate feature:

IOS: Settings > Cellular [etisalat SIM] > Wi-Fi Calling > Switch toggle.

Android: Settings > Mobile network > [etisalat SIM] > Wi-Fi Calling > Switch toggle On.

What is e& eSIM

eSIM is an embedded SIM, enabling you to activate your line without the need for a physical SIM card .

Previous
Instant Activation
Switch to eSIM instantly via my e& app without visiting the store

1. Update My e& app to the latest version

2. Log in using Quick Login

3. Go to Services Select eSIM & follow the steps



One Device, Multiple Numbers
Easily toggle between work, personal, or international numbers on the same device
Better for the Environment
eSIM is Planet Friendly as no plastic waste anymore

What are the Eligible Rate plans & what is the eSIM fees?

Will an eSIM work with my device?

General
Rules
1

Switching to an eSIM:
Egyptian customers have the right to request a switch from a physical SIM to an eSIM through the My e& app .

2

Removing the eSIM profile:
In case the eSIM profile is deleted, the customer/end user must visit the nearest e& store to request a new e-IM profile.

3

Replacing the eSIM:
When replacing the eSIM, ensure that the old eSIM profile is removed from the mobile device and the new eSIM profile is installed.

4

Downloading the eSIM profile:
The eSIM profile can only be downloaded from within the Arab Republic of Egypt.

5

QR Code Validity:
The QR Code for activating the eSIM is valid for 5 days from the date of purchase or replacement.

History Of Egypt
Egypt

Egypt Possesses One Of The Oldest Histories Of Any Modern Country, Originating In The Tenth Millennium BCE As One Of The World’s First Nation States. Considered A Cradle Of Civilization, Ancient Egypt Experienced Some Of Mankind’s Earliest Developments In Writing, Agriculture, Urbanization, Organized Religion And Central Government.

Gems Of Egypt

Iconic Monuments Such As The Giza Necropolis And Its Great Sphinx, As Well The Ruins Of Memphis, Thebes, Karnak, And The Valley Of The Kings, Reflect This Legacy And Remain A Primary Focus Of Archaeological Study And Popular Interest Worldwide. Egypt’s Rich Cultural Heritage Is An Integral Part Of Its National Identity, Having Endured And, At Times.

Do’s

— Carry Identification With You At All Times.

— Carry Some Cash When Heading To Remote Locations.

— Respect The Local Customs And Conservative Dress Codes.

Dont’s

— Feel Obliged To Tip Everyone.

— Take Pictures In Areas Where Photography Is Prohibited.

7070 Concierge Services

Enjoy all-in-one solution from the comfort of your home. With 7070, arrange all your medical tests, renew your ID or passport, reserve your favorite spot at the cinema, repair your phone, fix your car, and a lot more with special discounts.

 7070—your gateway to a world of services is just a call away.
E& egypt
Directory Services
Medical Services

Call 7070 for special discounts on home or lab tests, scans, and examinations at various hospitals and clinics. Service Provided by Axon.

Car Maintenance Services

Call 7070 for special discounts on original autoparts, engine oil, installation fees, and enjoy free full car check-ups at your doorstep. Service provided by YourParts.

Cinema Reservation Services

Call 7070 to book your cinema tickets at Point 90 and Plaza Cinemas from the comfort of your home.

Governmental Services

Call 7070 to receive special discounts on renewing your governmental documents (including passport renewal, National ID renewal, and more) from the comfort of your home. Service Provided by El Metr.

Mobile Fixing Services

Call 7070 and enjoy special discounts on Apple accessories, at-home repairs, and free device cleaning services for Apple devices only. Service provided by Fixtech.

Roadside Assistance Services

Call 7070 and get special discounts on roadside assistance services anytime, anywhere. Service provided by Helpoo.

Travel Services

Only for Emerald customers! Book your vacation & enjoy a guaranteed discount up to 30% on any hotel worldwide, and more benefits. To subscribe call 7070. Service Provided by Global Travel Organization (GTO) .

Gifting Services

Call 7070 and get special discounts on flower bouquets, vases, and more exquisite gifts, with delivery to your doorstep. Service Provided by Floward.

Directory Services

Call 7070 to access a comprehensive directory for various services and businesses.

About us

All about e& Egypt and the executive team

E& egypt’s Beginning

E& egypt Started Its Operations In The Egyptian Market In May 2007 With A Series Of Successes, Being The First Operator To Present 3.5 G High Quality Services. The Company Was Also The First To Introduce 4G Services To Its Customers, Without Needing To Replace Their SIM Cards To Activate It. This Is In Addition To The Continuous Improvement To Its Network.

E& egypt Offers Premium International Services, Enabling Its Customers To Enjoy Competitive International Calling Rates To All Countries Across The Globe. e& egypt Also Provides High-Speed Internet Services, ADSL For Homes, While Launching Fixed Landline Services To Become The First Fully Digital Operator.

The
Company

Experience In The Egyptian Telecom Market, According To Many Reports Including The TRIM Report That Routinely Measures The Quality Of Services Offered, The Customer Base, And Market Share. The Report Concluded That The Company’s Market Share Has Increased, Proving It Is The “Best Network In Egypt” Given The Services It Provides

E& egypt Is Committed To Supporting, Building And Developing The Communities It Operates In, While Working On Improving Their Livelihoods. e& egypt Believes That Its Success Is Driven By The Success Of The Countries’ Economies In Which It Operates, While Strongly Contributing To Its Development. e& egypt Not Only Provides Services And Technologies That Keep Our Customers Connected, But Also Contributes To Initiatives, Which Help Maintain Citizens’ Health And Encourage Them To Learn And Explore What’s New. e& egypt Supports Business Development, Innovation Increase And Keeping Pace With Ongoing Changes.

Vison

Being Egypt’s Top Digital Telco Brand

Mission

Delivering Insightful, Segmented Services To Enrich Lives In A Changing World
A Changing World

Technology &
Information Quality Policy
The Technology department of e& egypt is committed to :
Plan, develop, deploy, operate and maintain Technology solutions and business to business (B2B) products & services with high level of quality to meet our customers' requirements and expectations.
Comply with ISO 9001 :2015 requirements and all applicable quality legislative and regulatory requirements.
Conduct regular reviews to ensure compliance with the quality management system standards.

We are looking forward to continual improvement in the effectiveness of the quality management systems. Our quality policy is reviewed annually or whenever there is a strategic change in the organization plans.

In alignment with e& egypt ’s strategic goals, the Technology department of e& egypt annually establishes its quality objectives within the quality manual. The achievements of these objectives are to be reviewed in management reviews.

We are communicating this quality policy within the organization to be sure that it is fully understood and available.

Rights & Duties

Your
Rights
Subscription Rights

1 ⚊ Obtain A Maximum Number Of 10 Voice Lines And 5 Data Lines, With One National ID Number. (For Citizens)

2 ⚊ Obtain A Maximum Number Of 5 Voice Lines And 5 Data Lines, With One Passport Number. (For Foreign Customers)

3 ⚊ Review The Terms In Full And Get A Certified Copy Of The Contract.

4 ⚊ Unsubscribe To Any Service Without Your Prior Consent.

5 ⚊ Receive Free-Of-Charge Codes And Numbers To Access Any Service And Offer Details Before Subscription.

6 ⚊ Shift To Another Operator With The Same Number Within 24 Hours And Without Extra Charges (For Mobile Phone Users)

7 ⚊ Subscribe To The Fixed Internet Service Within 48 Hours From The Date Of Submitting The Application, And The Right To Request Its Cancellation Within 24 Hours. In Cases Of Copper Lines, 72 Hours For Subscription And 3 Days For Cancellation.

8 ⚊ Open 3 E-Wallets At Maximum Per Each ID Number And With 3 Different SIM Cards (For Mobile Phone Users)

Usage Rights

1 ⚊ Obtain Licensed Telecom Devices Which Should Also Be In Conformity With Standards.

2 ⚊ Have Your Personal Data Safeguarded And Your Privacy Protected.

3 ⚊ Notify Operators With Any Changes To Your Data Registered Upon Subscription.

4 ⚊ Dial Emergency Numbers For Free (Fire Department, Civil Defense, Ambulance, Police).

5 ⚊ Contact The Operator’s Customer Service Over 24 Hours For Queries And Complaints.

6 ⚊ Escalate Complaints To NTRA’s Call Center Over 24 Hours, If Failed To Reach A Satisfactory Solution With The Operator.

7 ⚊ Cancel E-Wallets When Deactivating The SIM Card Or Moving To Another Operator With The Same Number (For Mobile Phone Users).

Billing Rights

1 ⚊ Get Detailed Monthly Invoices Including Consumption Cost And Period. Additionally, You Have The Right To Demand An E-Invoice For Free.

2 ⚊ Access Consumption Details Via Operator’s E-Channels (Website, Application).

3 ⚊ Receive Regular Messages For Free, With The Consumption Of Contracted Packages.

4 ⚊ Get Informed Of The Charging Amount And Any Other Dues Deducted From Your Credit, Via Free SMS Upon Re-Charging, If Any.

5 ⚊ Get Informed Of Any Financial Deductions From Your Credit, For Any Reason, Upon Deduction.

6 ⚊ Get Notified With The Service-Deactivation One Week Prior At Least, In Case The Operator’s Dues Are Not Paid.

7 ⚊ Recover Any Remaining Amounts In Your E-Wallet While Being Closed, If Any (For Mobile Users).

Your
Duties

1 ⚊ Abstain From Dealing With Unauthorized Bodies That Are Not Licensed To Provide Telecom Services. The Consumer Should Report To The Concerned Authorities On Such Bodies.

2 ⚊ Report To NTRA Any Violation Of Law Such As Bypassing International Calls Or Connecting An Illegal Sub-Line, So As Not To Be Penalized By Law. Or Connecting An Illegal Branch Line.

3 ⚊ Review The Terms Of The Contract With The Service Provider Carefully And Keep A Copy For Reference If Needed.

4 ⚊ The Necessity To Inform The Service Provider About Any Changes That Occurred To The Consumer Data That He Registered When Contracting The Service.

5 ⚊ Abstain From Violating The Contractual Stipulations Or Conditions Of Service Provision.

6 ⚊ Inform The Service Provider About The Lost Or Stolen SIM Card

7 ⚊ Abstain From Subscribe To Any Service Or Offer Before Knowing Well About The Terms And Conditions Related To It.

8 ⚊ Abstain From Violating The Infrastructure Used To Provide Telecommunications Services.

9 ⚊ Abstain From Use Any Illegal Communications Devices That Would Interfere With Telecommunications Networks.

10 ⚊ Abstain From Use A Mobile Phone While Driving In Order To Protect Your Life And The Lives Of Other.

11 ⚊ Dealing With The Customer Service Employee Properly.

Contracts

Mobile line
Subscription Contract
General Terms and Conditions
Definitions

1 ⚊ Contract:

It means this contract signed between the company and the customer, which consists of these terms and conditions combined with the customer’s complete data and line number, the Contract is drawn up in two identical copies.

2 ⚊ The NTRA:

It means the National Telecommunications Regulatory Authority (NTRA) established under the provisions of the Telecommunications Regulatory Law promulgated by Law No. 10 of 2003.

3 ⚊ The Company:

It is e& egypt , an Egyptian joint stock company, registered in the commercial registry under No. 107361, located in Building S4 - Down Town Mall - Ninety Street - Fifth Settlement - New Cairo - Egypt, and licensed by the NTRA to provide mobile phone services within the Arab Republic of Egypt.

4 ⚊ Service:

The mobile phone service licensed by the NTRA to the Company. Customer/subscriber: Any natural person contracting with the company to benefit from the service and who is legally responsible for the contract.

5 ⚊ SIM Card:

It is the service activation card that the customer receives after signing the contract.

6 ⚊ Customer/ subscriber:

Any natural person contracting with the company to benefit from the service and who is legally responsible for the contract.

General Terms

1 ⚊ The term of this contract:

Is a calendar year starting from the date of signing this contract and is automatically renewed for the same period(s) unless either party notifies the other by a registered mail with acknowledgment of receipt or by any appropriate mean that the party intends not to renew the contract within 30 days before the expiry of the contract term.

2 ⚊ This contract is personal:

And is not transferable or assignable to others without a prior written consent from the company, and the service is provided for the personal use of the customer, therefore, he/she is not entitled to resell the service or deal with any other third party to benefit from it.

3 ⚊ If the postpaid:

Customer terminates the contract before the term of the contract, he must pay any due bills in addition to the monthly subscription amount for the days in which he actually used the network and any of the related services.

See More
Company’s Obligations

1 ⚊ The responsibility:

Of the company towards the customer is limited to providing the licensed mobile phone services from the NTRA in accordance with the laws and regulations in force in the Arab Republic of Egypt.

2 ⚊ The company:

Shall provide the service in accordance with the level of service quality specified in the license issued by the NTRA and in accordance with the technical specifications applicable to the company

3 ⚊ The postpaid customer:

Has the right to obtain a detailed invoice for the company’s dues (detailing the contracted package - the value of the monthly subscription - the value of the added tax or any other fees).

4 ⚊In the event:

Of the customer’s request, the company shall provide him with a detailed statement showing the volume of his consumption of the service (statement of calls, messages, time periods, megabytes/gigabytes) and the consumption period, and such statement may be in paper form for a fee determined by the company after approval of the NTRA or in a free digital form.

See More
Customer Obligations

1 ⚊ The customer:

Must purchase prepaid charging cards or use any other charging method to maintain a sufficient balance that enables him to use the company’s services or pay the monthly fees to maintain the service in the case of the monthly postpaid customers

2 ⚊ If the customer:

Does not recharge the balance before the expiry of the validity period or pay the fees or the monthly subscription to operate the service again during the period specified by the NTRA, then the company has the right to consider this contract cancelled, and this is a waiver by the customer of all his rights regarding the suspended line and its Remaining balance (if any) and the company has the right to dispose of the line number to any other customer.

3 ⚊ The customer:

Pays the value of the specified and non-refundable subscriptions in one payment in advance upon signing the contract
